name: BoxPanic
description:
Click to the left or right of your character to move, on PC you can use A and D or the left and right arrow keys also.

A tiny 64x64 pixel infinite runner.

I've tested this on pc, android and ios, but let me know if you get it working on something else!

This was an old project I reworked mostly as a test to see if I could get saving/loading to work in html5.
